Class ExcelUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • dealDataset

        public static java.util.LinkedList<User> dealDataset(java.lang.String filePath)

      • readDataSet

        public static void readDataSet(java.lang.String filePath)
        read data by file path and store them into corresponding list.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the path of input excel file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the content of cell is none, it will assign '0' to the cell artificially.
